name: The Musketeer (zPikA, QueteGames)
description:
The musketeer is a short action-adventure game. The player embodies the musketeer in his adventure to save his people.

Go on an adventure to save your people and defeat the boss that lies deep in the graveyard to free your town from evil.

Combat

Various enemies to fight in the 4 levels of the game.

Traps!

Exciting traps that will keep you always on the lookout.

Parkour

Jumps to the limit, but be careful not to fall to your death.

Credits:

Programming - Tomas Fernandez

Design - Francisco Roldan

Sprites made by: Ansimuz (from the gothicvania collection)

(https://ansimuz.itch.io/)

Disclaimer:

This game was made as a project for a programming class, The design is flawed but i've learnt a lot from this game and im quite happy with what we've made
